title: MAP Promotional Trailer: final edit version
abstract: Full Length and 90 sec re-edit version of promotional trailer for MAP.
description: Full Length and 90 sec re-edit version of promotional trailer for MAP. Features Interviews with Filmmaker Joan Robinson, Filmmaker Michael Carmody, Writer and Filmmaker Christos Tsiolkas (As ACMI employee) and Kim Montgomery - ACMI employee as well as samples from works contributed to the MAP project.
